Welcome to Year 1 statistics!

This year you will begin your statistics and data coding with R journey with us. You will complete two statistics modules: 

- PSYC121: Statistics for Psychologists 1, with John Towse and Tom Beesley

- PSYC122: Statistics for Psychologists 2, with Margriet Groen and Rob Davies
